attributes.action: Request the navy to protect our borders as a state of emergency.
attributes.additional_details: Because our country can not take any more illegal Immigration, we are now at tipping point, and something needs doing to rectify this situation and get our economy back in the right direction.
attributes.background: I request that the navy be used to protect our borders which are still being violated by illegal immigration, as it is now at a state of emergency.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
